title: Fix PIN authentication stuck on 'verifying access'

requirements.text: Fix the SupernaturalPinLogin page so that PIN authentication does not get stuck on 'verifying access'. The page must perform purely client-side PIN validation against the hardcoded PIN '022025', call the AdminContext login function on success, and immediately redirect to the admin dashboard without waiting on any Internet Identity principal check or async backend call that could hang.
acceptanceCriteria: Entering PIN '022025' on /supernatural resolves immediately and redirects to the admin dashboard without getting stuck.
Entering an incorrect PIN shows an error message and does not redirect.
The 'verifying access' state resolves within a short, deterministic timeout and never hangs indefinitely.
No Internet Identity or backend actor call blocks the PIN validation flow.
AdminContext login state is set correctly on successful PIN entry so the dashboard remains accessible.

constraints: PIN validation must remain purely client-side â€” do not introduce any backend calls into the SupernaturalPinLogin flow.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Adding Internet Identity authentication to the /supernatural route.
Modifying any other admin pages or backend logic.
